name: Cuc Cu Home
address: 4 Vong Duc, Hoan Kiem, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in Hanoi, Cuc Cu Home offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. The apartment is 300 metres from Ba Dinh Square. Private parking is available on site.

There is a dining area and a kitchen. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Trang Tien Plaza is 300 metres from Cuc Cu Home, while Hanoi Opera House is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
